PersonalStatement.text: Erica Silva, born on 1993-12-31, is a Male based in North Michelleborough, Gibraltar. He is Married and holds Mexican nationality. Currently working at Blanchard-Sanders.

WorkExperience.text: Systems Administrator at Cowan, Johnson and Frey from 2006 to 2019.
Senior Project Manager at Blanchard-Sanders, 2020 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Bachelor's in Civil Engineering from University of Massachusetts Boston
Master's in Engineering from Ivan Franko National University of Lviv

PersonalSkills.text: Problem-solving: Skilled in troubleshooting and optimizing complex systems.
Leadership: Proven track record of managing cross-functional teams.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys playing tennis.
